Khachkar.ImportantFeatures: The cross is carved in a niche, and the two wings have two triple-loops. the moddle loop is stretched and has a form of a flower bud taht gives a blossoming and vegetative appearance to the cross. the two little crosses on the right and the left parts of the central cross symbolize the two bandits crucified witht the Christ. On the right and the left sides of the main cross, as well inteh corners of the niche the artist carved angles. the details of the little crosses ore carved like braid, and teh wings are copped with double buttons khachkar has a unique rostte it's, The cross is carved in a niche, and the two wings have two triple-loops. the moddle loop is stretched and has a form of a flower bud taht gives a blossoming and vegetative appearance to the cross. the two little crosses on the right and the left parts of the central cross symbolize the two bandits crucified witht the Christ. On the right and the left sides of the main cross, as well inteh corners of the niche the artist carved angles. the details of the little crosses ore carved like braid, and teh wings are copped with double buttons khachkar has a unique rostte with the same ornaments on both right and left sides.
